RelatedSentence: The event , to be held at Emperors Palace in Ekurhuleni , will kick off start with Steel and Engineering Industries Federation of SA ( Seifsa ) CEO Kaizer Nyatsumba speaking about bridging the government and business communication deficit .
Seifsa represents 27 independent employer associations in the metal and engineering industries , with a combined membership of 2,200 companies employing some 220,000 people .
Seifsa represents 27 independent employer associations in the metal and engineering industries , with a combined membership of 2,200 companies employing some 220,000 people .
Members range from steel makers to micro-enterprises employing fewer than 50 people .
Ekurhuleni executive mayor Mondli Gungubele will deliver the keynote address .
This will be driven by infrastructure development , content localisation , product beneficiation , regional trade integration and exports , and industrial financing .

But Seifsa is concerned about the purchasing managers index figures released this month , saying they indicate that business conditions in the metals and engineering sector and the overall manufacturing industry remain tough .

But Seifsa is concerned about the purchasing managers index figures released this month , saying they indicate that business conditions in the metals and engineering sector and the overall manufacturing industry remain tough .

Mr Nyatsumba said employers in the sector - most of whom have struggled in recent years - were also very deeply concerned about the threat to centralised collective bargaining posed by recent judgments of the Labour Court .

Mr Nyatsumba said employers in the sector - most of whom have struggled in recent years - were also very deeply concerned about the threat to centralised collective bargaining posed by recent judgments of the Labour Court .
He said historically centralised collective bargaining offered employers the comfort that , once negotiations were concluded , they would not be confronted ...

with similar demands that would have the effect of increasing the cost of employment .
Seifsa chief economist Henk Langenhoven said in March that the federation was encouraged by the strong performance of the metals and engineering sector in January , with 4.5 % growth year on year .
Seifsa chief economist Henk Langenhoven said in March that the federation was encouraged by the strong performance of the metals and engineering sector in January , with 4.5 % growth year on year .
This meant 2014 started on a much better footing than 2013 , he said .
But he also said production data was notorious for its volatility .
The indaba will also see the launch of the Manufacturing Circle first quarter 2014 bulletin and survey .
This will be presided over by Pan-African Capital CEO Iraj Abedian and the industry body 's chairman , Mike Arnold , who is also group MD of Consol Glass .
